name: 研究方法與論文寫作
description: This course aims to help students develop the ability to compose a well-organized and well-focused academic essay in English. Its goals are to introduce strategies for the purpose, organization, presentation, development, coherence, and unity of thesis writing. Essential elements in a thesis such as summaries, abstracts, arguments, data commentaries, critiques, etc. will be discussed and practice in writing will be assigned. Whenever appropriate, we will also talk about skills in doing independent academic research in language and linguistics. Students are expected to learn to use library resources and explore various approaches of data collection and analysis. The ultimate purpose is to familiarize students with the steps in doing academic research and help them develop abilities in critical thinking/writing, intellectual reasoning, problem-solving, and collaborative learning.

syllabus:
**\[For** **students of LINGUISTICS****\]** **這堂課是針對英語系語言組研究生的論文寫作課，因此課上講授內容與範例、要求同學課堂報告的論文及寫作作業都是以語言學(非語言教學)為基礎。**
